original_text: He chose 3,000 men from Israel's army to be with him. 2,000 of those men stayed with him at Michmash and in the hill country of Bethel. Then 1,000 men were with his son Jonathan at Gibeah, in the land of Benjamin's tribe. Saul sent all the other men of the army back to their homes.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람 삼천 명을 택하여 그 중에서 이천 명은 자기와 함께 믹마스와 벧엘 산에 있게 하고 일천 명은 요나단과 함께 베냐민 기브아에 있게 하고 남은 백성은 각기 장막으로 보내니라

sentences.original_text: He chose 3,000 men from Israel's army
2,000 of those men stayed with him
at Michmash and in the hill country of Bethel
Then 1,000 men were with his son Jonathan
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 1,000명은 그의 아들 요나단과 함께 있었다

sentences.original_text: in the land of Benjamin's tribe
Saul sent all the other men of the army
sentences.korean_translation: 사울은 군대의 다른 모든 사람들을 보냈다
